metadata.Title: CVE-2018-0505 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Mediawiki 1.31 before 1.31.1, 1.30.1, 1.29.3 and 1.27.5 contains a flaw where BotPasswords can bypass CentralAuth's account lock

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2018-0505` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.31.1-2
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.31.1-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.31.1-2').
